document.full_text: ivory coast's former ruling party acknowledged on wednesday that president alassane ouattara had won november's disputed election, but said it would not join a unity government until ex-president laurent gbagbo was freed.
document.title: gbagbo party to shun ivory coast government
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's former ruling party acknowledged on wednesday that president alassane ouattara had won november's disputed election, but said it would not join a unity government until ex-president laurent gbagbo was freed.
